question: Write a letter to a friend who worked at your previous company. You have moved to a new job in a new city. • describe your city • describe your job • describe the arrangements for him to visit you Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: Hope this letter finds you in a pink of health.  I am writing to tell you about my new job location and position.

After my selection in a soft company in Mumbai as a developer. Last month, I shifted to Mumbai along with my family. Since, I was little engaged to set myself in the new culture and environment. Hence, I could not talk to you. I am sincerely apologizing for it.

First and foremost, the working hours here are so flexible that you can start your work even in the evening providing 8 hours of work to be completed as per company norms. The team with which I am working are so co-operative and helpful.

Moreover, I would like to tell you about  Mumbai city. As you are aware that Mumbai is a city of  various heritage places, food and fun. I would like you to visit Mumbai next month. Please do not bother about the accommodation. You will stay with us only.
I humbly request you to plan your trip and let me know your arrival date in Mumbai. Look forward to seeing you soon

error_list.error_des: It seems that preposition use may be incorrect here.
It appears that you have an unnecessary comma after the subordinating conjunction Since. Consider removing the comma.
